item.name: Toilet cleaning product
item.description: Cilit BANG, and the dirt is gone.

item.name: A manky toilet brush
item.description: You find a toilet brush that looks like it's from the roman times. Only Thor himself could scrub hard enough to clean anything with this - It is no more than a stick and sponge that keeps falling off. Ew! The stick end has been sharpened down and has a faded red colour to it... Hmm

item.name: A power scented bubble bath
item.description: You put it in a bath of powerful people.

item.name: A pink rubber duck
item.description: A top essential for every bath. Closely followed by candles.

item.name: A Kitchen prepared lunch
item.description: Prepared by the Kremlin's finest cooks this meal consists of a jacket potato, cheese and a bottle of vodka.

item.name: Tesco meal deal.
item.description: This is Stalin's favourite Meal Deal Combo, Falafel and Houmous Wrap for his main (the mango chutney really compliments the chickpeas) and a Flake for his snack (this delicate milk chocolate bar compliments his choice of main perfectly).

item.name: Kirillina's collar
item.description: This huge studded collar initially appears to be better suited a rhino, than a pet. As you look closer you notice the small pink flowers engrained into the fabric of the collar, as well as the name, 'Kirillina'.

item.name: Chain lead
item.description: This chain lead looks more in line to haul a ship than a pet.

item.name: Today's Job list
item.description: 1. clean toilet 2. fetch lunch 3. fetch Kirillina 4. run bath 5. dispose of Capitalists.

item.name: Your Happiness
item.description: It's your first day, your eyes still shine with hope and contentment, this will soon fade.

item.name: Tamed bear
item.description: The majestic beast that is Kirillina
